---
name: UI/UX Improvement
about: Suggest an improvement to the user interface or user experience
title: "[UI/UX]: "
labels: ui/ux, enhancement
assignees: ""
---

**Current Behavior**
Describe how the UI/UX currently behaves. Screenshots or screen recordings are highly encouraged.

**Proposed Improvement**
Describe how you think it should behave or look. Mockups, sketches, or references to other sites are very helpful.

**Reason for Change**
Why is this change necessary? Does it improve accessibility, usability, or aesthetics?

**Screenshots/Mockups**
If applicable, add screenshots or mockups to help explain your idea.

**Additional Context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
